resetSale(uint256).details: This function is intentioned to be called directly from the affected sales contract

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

contractName().notice: Contract name returns the pretty contract name

contractURI().notice: Contract URI returns the uri for more information about the given contract

resetSale(uint256).notice: This function resets the sales configuration for a given tokenId and contract.
